::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod continued to fire on the Newcomers. He then noticed that Kluster
was gone. He activated his comlink, on Maximal frequincy's.
"Kluster, what are you up to?"
Hot Rod then runs up to Savanna.
"So mutch for the CR chamber. Koga is disabled, if we hit on his body
for a wile, we can terminate him."
Hot Rod then shoots 8 plasma charges, at all Predicons.
